content.title: Adding Else Condition
content.body:
Since the user has satisfied the conditions set, he should be notified that his Sign Up process is over.

  1. From the Action Editor canvas, select Start.
  2. From the Action Editor left menu, under Conditions select the Else Condition.
  3. From the Action Editor left menu, under Widget , select Set Widget Property.
    A new action will be added to your Action Editor canvas under ELSE.
  4. In the right pane, expand Mobile Forms > frmRegistration > ACMERegister > flxACMERegister and select flxActivation.
  5. In the right pane, ensure that:
    • Property is set to isVisible
    • Visibility is set to True
  6. Click Save.
